abstract: Stocks rise, lifted by positive earnings reports and signs that Greece might be willing to broker a new deal with its creditors.
lead_paragraph: Signs that Greece might be willing to broker a deal with its creditors also lifted the market.

headline.main: Profits and Good Company News Lift Shares
headline.print_headline: Profits and Good Company News Lift Shares

snippet: Signs that Greece might be willing to broker a deal with its creditors also lifted the market.
